mapper.insert: insert into ANNUAL_RULE(rule_id, years_of_service, leave_days) values (rule_id_seq.nextval, #{years_of_service}, #{leave_days})
mapper.select: select count(*) from ANNUAL_RULE where years_of_service = #{years_of_service}
mapper.insert: insert into WorkingHours ( workingHours_id, dept_id, emp_code_id, standard_check_in, standard_check_out, grace_period_in, grace_period_out, is_active ) values ( WorkingHours_id_seq.nextval, #{deptId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{empCodeId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{standardCheckIn, jdbcType=TIME}, #{standardCheckOut, jdbcType=TIME}, #{gracePeriodIn, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gracePeriodOut, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isActive, jdbcType=CHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT e.emp_code_id AS empCodeId, e.emp_name AS employeeName, TO_CHAR(w.standard_check_in, 'HH24:MI') AS standardCheckIn, TO_CHAR(w.standard_check_out, 'HH24:MI') AS standardCheckOut, w.grace_period_in AS gracePeriodIn, w.grace_period_out AS gracePeriodOut, w.is_active AS isActive FROM employee e LEFT JOIN WorkingHours w ON e.emp_code_id = w.emp_code_id WHERE e.dept_id = #{deptId}
